code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./NewsForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NewsForm(_ref){let{setResult,setLoading}=_ref;const[inputType,setInputType]=useState('text');const[text,setText]=useState('');const[url,setUrl]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const payload=inputType==='text'?{text}:{url};try{setLoading(true);setResult(null);const res=await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/analyze',payload);setResult(res.data);}catch(error){alert('Something went wrong!
